```{r}
#Using GGPLOT, plot the Base World Map
mp <- NULL
mapWorld <- borders("world", colour="gray50", fill="gray50") # create a layer of borders
mp <- ggplot() +   mapWorld
mp<-mp+geom_point(aes(x=lon,y=lat),color="blue",size=3)
mp
```
```{r}
library(dplyr)
actualloan<-filter(loans,status=="paid")
View(actualloan) 
lon1<-actualloan$lon
lat1<-actualloan$lat

mp <- NULL
mapWorld <- borders("world", colour="gray50", fill="gray50") # create a layer of borders
mp <- ggplot() +   mapWorld
mp<-mp+geom_point(aes(x=lon1,y=lat1),color="blue",size=1)
mp

```
